title: RT News - October 20, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: Barcelona is gripped by a sixth consecutive night of protests as pro-independence activists vent their anger over the jailing of separatist leaders. Brexit is delayed again as the UK parliament forces leader Boris Johnson to send a letter to the EU asking for an extension. Although he also tells them he thinks a further postponement would be damaging. Donald Trump takes credit for Turkey pausing its offensive against the Kurds in Syria. But Ankara points at the fine print saying it's not the 'ceasefire' Washington is claiming.
description: Barcelona is gripped by a sixth consecutive night of protests as pro-independence activists vent their anger over the jailing of separatist leaders
